===Etymology===
Probably from {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=へんしん}} as compound {{m|ltc|變身|tr=pjenH syin||change” + “body; self}}. Compare modern {{etyl|cmn|-}} traditional {{m|cmn|變身}} and simplified {{m|cmn|变身|tr=biàn shēn}}.

===Pronunciation===
* {{l|ja|sc=Latn|音読み|On'yomi}}
* {{ja-accent-common|h|へ|んしん}}<ref name="NHK">{{R:NHK Hatsuon}}</ref>
* {{IPA|lang=ja|[hẽ̞ɴɕĩɴ]}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|へんしん}}

# a [[change]] of one's [[body]] into something else:
## a complete change of one's [[appearance]]
## a [[metamorphosis]] or [[transformation]] into something else
# a [[body]] so [[transform]]ed
